00068 #include "nt3d_vp_obj.h"
00080 class NT3D_abstract_vp_o : public NT3D_vp_o {
00081 public:
00082   /***   Constructors, CopyAssignment and Destructor  ***/  
00083   NT3D_abstract_vp_o();
00084   NT3D_abstract_vp_o(const NT3D_abstract_vp_o & original);
00085   const NT3D_abstract_vp_o & operator= (const NT3D_abstract_vp_o & right);
00086   ~NT3D_abstract_vp_o();
00087   /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00088   virtual void Draw() = 0; 
00090   void Init() {InitChild();pVP->Init();}
00091   NTreturn Resize(NTsize newWidth, NTsize newHeight) {ResizeChild(newWidth,newHeight); return pVP->Resize(newWidth,newHeight);}
00092   void Redraw() {RedrawChild(); pVP->Redraw();}
00093   /* These methods call drv implemetnations only */
00094   void MakeCurrent() {pVP->MakeCurrent();}
00095   void SwapBuffer() {pVP->SwapBuffer();}
00096   NT3D_bitmap_o View2Bitmap() {return (NT3D_bitmap_o) pVP->View2Bitmap();}
00097   NT3D_bitmap_o * View2BitmapPtr(NT3D_bitmap_o * bmpPtr) {return pVP->View2BitmapPtr(bmpPtr);}
00098   NTsize _width(){return pVP->_width();}
00099   NTsize _height(){return pVP->_height();}
00100   /* ***  Data                 ***/
00101   protected:
00102   /* ***  Methods              ***/
00103   virtual void InitChild() = 0;
00104   virtual NTreturn ResizeChild(NTsize width, NTsize height) = 0;
00105   /* ***  Data                 ***/
00106   virtual void RedrawChild() = 0;
00107   /* ***  Data                 ***/  
00108   private:
00109   /* ***  Methods              ***/   
00110   /* ***  Data                 ***/
00111 };
